title: Herbed chicken liver pate
ingredients: ['55g (2 oz) butter', '1 large onion, finely chopped', '1 sprig of fresh thyme', '1 sprig of fresh rosemary', '1 sprig of fresh parsley', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '450g (1 lb) chicken livers, rinsed and trimmed', '55g (2 oz) cream cheese', '4 tablespoons milk', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste']
